textBeforeTable: Specifications Poster size: 27x39" Lamination keeps posters clean and resistant to damage Each state has its own posting requirement; your state poster may include: fair employment, minimum wage, worker's compensation, child labor and leave of absence Protect your company from non-compliance fines and potential lawsuits due to improper posting State poster must be displayed in a conspicuous location Required for all employers who have at least one paid employee Convenient, all-in-one solution for meeting required state labor law postings Montana Description Accessories Specifications Description Easy Returns Free Shipping
